ValidationRule.description: QTC Quotes cannot be recalled as they donot have quote approvals, since it will have LoA bypass for all quotes
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Integration API Only Profile", TEXT( NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c ) = 'QTC', TEXT( PRIORVALUE( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c ) ) = 'In Review', TEXT( Apttus_QPApprov__Approval_Status__c) = 'Pending Approval', ISCHANGED(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Recall Quote action is not used for QTC Quotes. Please use the Recall Approvals from the Approvals quick action menu item.
